long_description: Take the Lafuma Micro Pop Up chair along on all your road trips and car-camping adventures. It packs away small for easy transportation and weighs only 2 lbs. 8 oz. Batyline(R) mesh fabric stands up to UV radiation, resists mold and withstands regular use in the outdoors. Aluminum frame keeps the weight down; durable elastomer joints stand up to years of use. Small strap keeps the chair closed; another strap gives you a place to carry the Lafuma Micro Pop Up chair.
short_description: Take the Lafuma Micro Pop Up chair along on all your road trips and car-camping adventures. It packs away small for easy transportation and weighs only 2 lbs. 8 oz.
